data.title: Neurizon begins dosing NUZ-001 in HEALEY ALS Trial; first of 160 participants in 36-week trial evaluating drug for ALS.
data.description: Key Points: The first individual has been enrolled and administered NUZ-001 in Regimen I of the HEALEY ALS Platform Trial, which assesses the drug's efficacy in treating ALS. Around 160 ALS patients are expected to participate in this 36-week randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled Phase 2/3 trial.

data.title: Playa Bowls signs 3 multi-unit agreements, approaching 400 shops nationwide. Strong growth seen in 2026.
data.description: In 2026, Playa Bowls, the top superfruit bowl brand in the nation, is experiencing significant growth with a robust development pipeline and an expanding franchise network. Based in BELMAR, N.J., the company is accelerating its expansion with strong momentum. The brand specializes in superfruit and acai bowl offerings, positioning itself as a leader in the industry. This growth is evidenced by the increasing number of franchises and new locations being opened. With a focus on providing healthy and delicious options, Playa Bowls is poised for further success in the market.

data.title: Dental.com and Voicify partner to provide 24/7 patient access for DSOs, offering integrated voice AI capabilities.
data.description: In Irvine, California, Dental.com, a virtual dental care platform by Virtual Dental Care, Inc., has partnered with Voicify, a voice AI platform for dental practices and DSOs. This collaboration aims to provide a comprehensive, round-the-clock patient acquisition and conversion solution for DSOs and multi-site dental groups. By integrating Dental.com's virtual care, patient acquisition, and AI-driven engagement tools with Voicify's direct and PMS-integrated voice AI system, the partnership seeks to enhance the operations of dental organizations. This strategic alliance will offer a seamless and advanced approach to acquiring and converting patients, ensuring a more efficient and effective process.

data.title: The Media Trust creates Product Advisory Council to combat digital threats; Council includes leaders from Amazon, Microsoft, Disney, and more.
data.description: In McLean, Virginia, The Media Trust (TMT) recently hosted the first meeting of its Product Advisory Council, aimed at tackling rising digital threats. Senior leaders from various companies in the advertising technology sector, such as Microsoft, Amazon, Index Exchange, Freestar, BBC, Criteo, Simpli.fi, NewsUK, Disney, The Trade Desk, Mail Metro Media, and Future, gathered to strategize on combatting these threats. The council aims to coordinate efforts against digital threats and protect the online ecosystem.

data.title: Book "Robert Goddard's Massachusetts" released Mar 3 honors the centennial of the world's first modern rocket launch.
data.description: The book "Robert Goddard's Massachusetts," written by Lowell Observatory Historian Kevin Schindler and Charles Slatkin, is set to be launched on March 3. This comes as Flagstaff, Arizona, prepares to mark the centenary of Robert H. Goddard's pioneering achievement in launching the world's inaugural liquid-fuel rocket. The date of release is February 26, 2026, and the landmark event was pivotal in pushing advancements in space exploration.

data.title: American Water urges customers to update contact information for emergency alerts. Largest utility in U.S. (NYSE: AWK).
data.description: American Water, the leading water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., advises customers to promptly update their contact details to receive crucial service alerts. It is essential for customers to ensure receipt of emergency notifications. The company, listed under the NYSE as AWK, emphasizes the importance of staying connected for their services.

data.title: Deltix platform now integrates with AX Perpetual Futures Exchange, correcting previous news.
data.description: On February 25, 2026, Architect Financial Technologies Inc announced the integration of Deltix Trading Platform with AX Perpetual Futures Exchange. The collaboration aims to enhance trading efficiency and provide advanced functionalities to users. The update in the headline of the news release indicates the strategic partnership between the two companies. This integration is set to revolutionize the trading experience for users by combining cutting-edge technology and financial expertise. Stay tuned for more updates on this promising collaboration.
Friday FX Option Expiries

data.title: Levrx aims to improve specialty medication journey in Feb 26 release, addressing confusion and fragmentation in experience.
data.description: In Troy, New York, as of February 26, 2026, the process of managing specialty medications can be overwhelming and disjointed for many individuals. Patients often struggle to track the progress of their prescriptions and understand the status of their orders, leading to a lack of transparency in the system. This confusion is a result of the intricate routing of specialty medications through specific channels, creating a barrier to a seamless experience. The need for clarity and accessibility in this process is evident, with the aim to streamline the distribution of specialty medications and enhance the overall patient experience.

data.title: Healthcare Triangle raises $3.959M through stock financing on Nasdaq. Leader in digital healthcare solutions.
data.description: Pleasanton, California - On February 26, 2026, Healthcare Triangle, Inc. (Nasdaq: HCTI), a prominent provider of digital transformation solutions for healthcare and life sciences, revealed that it has finalized agreements for acquiring a new entity. The Company is recognized for its innovative approach in the industry and continues to expand its portfolio through strategic acquisitions.

data.title: Breakthrough T1D (formerly JDRF) launches 2026 Walks in the US to raise funds for T1D research and celebrate community.
data.description: Unveiled on February 26, 2026, Breakthrough T1D, formerly known as JDRF, a key organization dedicated to type 1 diabetes (T1D) research and advocacy worldwide, has initiated the 2026 Breakthrough T1D Walks across the United States. These events aim to unite the community, boost awareness, and gather funds for essential initiatives.

data.title: KBRA assigns ratings to 44 classes of PMT Loan Trust 2026-CNF2 notes, totaling $301.5 million backed by 547 mortgage loans.
data.description: In New York, credit rating agency KBRA has assigned preliminary ratings to 44 classes of mortgage-backed notes from PMT Loan Trust 2026-CNF2, sponsored by PennyMac Corp. The prime RMBS transaction includes 547 agency-eligible, conforming mortgage loans totaling about $301.5 million as of March 1, 2026. PennyMac is an indirect, wholly-owned subsidiary of PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust.

data.title: Investigation underway for CatalystRCM's data breach exposing 139,000 records linked to diagnostic lab testing in Texas.
data.description: An investigation is currently being conducted by Schubert Jonckheer & Kolbe LLP into a data breach that occurred on Feb. 26, 2026, resulting in unauthorized access to the sensitive data of individuals who underwent diagnostic laboratory testing services associated with CatalystRCM, a revenue company based in Texas. The breach has affected a significant number of individuals, with their personal information compromised. The breach poses a serious threat to the privacy and security of those impacted, prompting immediate action to address the situation and prevent further unauthorized access to sensitive data.

data.title: Copper Development Association offers free training on lead service line replacement for utilities and engineers.
data.description: A training program called Do It Proper with Copper is being offered by the Copper Development Association in McLean, Virginia as of February 26, 2026. This program is designed for utilities, municipalities, contractors, and engineers to help them install copper service lines accurately and confidently. The program aims to educate participants on best practices for installing copper service lines.

data.title: HVAC expert Dan Barrios of Oro Valley, Arizona stresses the necessity of year-round maintenance in mild weather.
data.description: In Oro Valley, Arizona on February 26, 2026, a recent article highlights the significance of consistent HVAC maintenance in Tucson, AZ, even during periods of mild weather. The article emphasizes the importance of not delaying HVAC service, despite the seemingly functional state of systems. Maintenance is crucial year-round as it helps to prevent potential issues and ensures efficient operation of HVAC systems.

data.title: Graphic Packaging (NYSE: GPK) declared a $0.11 per share quarterly dividend for its stockholders on Feb. 26, 2026.
data.description: In an announcement made on February 26, 2026, Graphic Packaging Holding Company, a prominent player in sustainable consumer packaging worldwide, revealed that a quarterly dividend of $0.11 per share of common stock has been declared by the Board of Directors. This dividend is set to be distributed to stockholders who are recorded at the close of business.

data.title: 7AI integrates with AWS Security Hub Extended for unified procurement, providing AI security operations.
data.description: In Boston, a recent integration between 7AI and AWS Security Hub extends agentic AI security operations to customers, offering a unified procurement experience. This collaboration aims to enhance security measures by incorporating AI technology into the AWS Security Hub, providing customers with advanced protection capabilities. The integration is set to streamline the procurement process for users and enable them to access cutting-edge security solutions. This development signifies a step forward in leveraging artificial intelligence for enhancing cybersecurity.

data.title: Blue Shield Promise and L.A. Care introduce SheWorks program for Black women's career advancement in Long Beach.
data.description: In Long Beach, California, on Feb. 26, 2026, Blue Shield of California Promise Health Plan and L.A. Care Health Plan revealed their collaboration on the innovative SheWorks program. This initiative aims to bolster economic mobility and enhance professional advancement opportunities. Through this partnership, they strive to offer essential support, with a significant emphasis on empowering individuals in their career growth.
